summary:
I have the right to work in the Netherlands as the partner of an EU National.

I am a Mechanical Engineer specialised in operations within the FMCG industry. Most recently I have held Production Team Lead and Demand Planning Analyst roles with Diageo Australia.

My experience has given me a strong knowledge of both the complexities that encompass high-speed manufacturing as, as well as deep insights into consumer habits and market patterns. Furthermore, I believe that my ability to clearly communicate complex ideas and adapt various problem-solving techniques has enabled me to be successful within various teams and across multiple projects. 

I would describe myself as motivated, personable and eager to learn. My favourite projects are the ones that push me to grow and develop in a team environment. My international experience in Australia and the USA, as well as recent European Travels, have brought me to the European market. I am looking for a role in a team where I can both be challenged and contribute to exceed targets and expectations.

school.name: University of North Carolina at Charlotte

profile_positions.description:
Role:
Manage the strategic 3-36 month plan for Dupixent end-to-end Supply-Chain across a complex structure of manufacturing sites while maintaining business objectives and target inventory levels.
Experience:
•	Facilitate the Dupixent S&OP cycle
•	Overcome supply chain obstacles caused by oversales, supplier constraints, regulatory changes, production restrictions and COVID-19.
•	Partner to launch the first E2E planning tool in Sanofi, connecting market demands to upstream plants and materials.
profile_positions.title: Global Network Planner, Dupixent

profile_positions.description:
Role:
Optimize and manage the finished good supply from plants to a complex array of customers and programs globally for the Sanofi Genzyme product portfolio contributing to overall healthy inventory levels.
Experience:
•	Represent the GCS in our weekly DRP cycle and ensure that priorities are escalated to the team to ensure that timely solutions are found.
•	Responsible for the set-up and maintenance of the planning tool master data to ensure DRP functionality worked as planned (stocking levels, BOD management, planning mode definition, shelf-life requirements, etc)
•	Own shared GMID’s allocations and build reporting to track MTO orders with adherence to lead-time.
profile_positions.title: DRP Planner

profile_positions.description:
Role:
Manage 10 team-members across 3 high-speed manufacturing lines which produced 10+ million cases annually. This includes having to balance different skills and expertise with daily constraints and priorities.
Experience:
•	Lead projects to minimise the amount of liquid being wasted on site. 
•	Implement material change that will save ~$40K annually.
•	Coach team members in best practices and ensure they have platforms for development set into place.
•	Liaise with onsite stakeholders (quality, receiving, asset-case, warehousing, technical, spirit-supply) to resolve production floor issues and improve operations.
profile_positions.title: Production Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Role:
Project led role centred around innovation launches, emerging markets, global allocations (special and rare releases), SLOBs management, warehouse distribution and brand change.
Experience:
•	Use SAP APO to build the demand plan on a SKU level.
•	Demand Planning lead on new innovation launches(NPD’s).
•	Conducted performance analysis for leadership team S&OP meetings at a categorical and wholesaler level.
•	Managed inventory movements between our interstate warehouses and implemented a permanent fix through forecast disaggregation.
•	Build Diageo Australia’s first demand plan for Aldi and Costco.
profile_positions.title: Demand Analyst
